name.generatorFwdBrgDefect: 发电机前轮驱动轴承缺陷
name.insulationDefectByAgingOil: 机油老化导致绝缘缺陷
name.insulationDefectByAgingMaterial: 材料老化导致绝缘缺陷

definition.WT1: 旋转不平衡是因为质量围绕转轴分布不均。不平衡所形成的力矩造成物体的摆动，即旋转结构的振动。 为了平衡转子，首先我们必须去测量不平衡。如果转子质心不在物体的旋转中心，则该转子不平衡。
definition.WT2: 轴承缺陷有以下几种原因：轴承缺陷有以下几种原因： 颗粒污染、不正确安装、错位、不正确润滑、高温、腐蚀、过度负荷、布氏硬度(真/假)、污染、松/紧配合。
definition.WT3: 轴承缺陷有以下几种原因： 颗粒污染、不正确安装、错位、不正确润滑、高温、腐蚀、过度负荷、布氏硬度(真/假)、污染、松/紧配合。
definition.WT4: 磨损是由于器件表层的脱落或变形从而导致的机械作用。表层的塑性形变以及碎片上脱落的颗粒常常造成金属的磨损。.
definition.WT5: Water in the lube oil will reduce the lubricating ability of the oil, resulting in damage to the bearings. Contamination sources such as: condensation, cooling water leaks, etc.; Particulate contamination of the oil will increase 轴承wear and lead to a 轴承failure. Contamination sources such as: dust/dirt influx through seals, 轴承wear particles, etc.
definition.WT6: 磨损是由于器件表层的脱落或变形从而导致的机械作用。表层的塑性形变以及碎片上脱落的颗粒常常造成金属的磨损。.
definition.WT7: 轴承缺陷有以下几种原因： 颗粒污染、不正确安装、错位、不正确润滑、高温、腐蚀、过度负荷、布氏硬度(真/假)、污染、松/紧配合。
definition.WT8: 旋转不平衡是因为质量围绕转轴分布不均。不平衡所形成的力矩造成物体的摆动，即旋转结构的振动。 为了平衡转子，首先我们必须去测量不平衡。如果转子质心不在物体的旋转中心，则该转子不平衡。
definition.WT9: 轴承缺陷有以下几种原因： 颗粒污染、不正确安装、错位、不正确润滑、高温、腐蚀、过度负荷、布氏硬度(真/假)、污染、松/紧配合。
definition.WT10: 由于可能的短路或绝缘失效，进而引发的发电机定子绕组故障将会导致定子电流增大以及定子绕组温度升高。
definition.WT11: Converter 缺陷 can be caused by thermal cycling, overheating or lightning strikes.
definition.WT12: 轴承缺陷有以下几种原因： 颗粒污染、不正确安装、错位、不正确润滑、高温、腐蚀、过度负荷、布氏硬度(真/假)、污染、松/紧配合。
definition.bearingDefectsCanCausedRotorImbalance: 电动机不平衡、错位或者配件间隙(油污染所致磨损)都会引起轴承缺陷。
definition.waterChemistryDepositingMaterialSuchSili: 水化学、物质沉降如硅或铜 - 某些化学物质会因不同的情况而析出，吸附在叶片上，增加阻力，造成叶片退化。
definition.waterBearingReduceLubrication: 轴承润滑油中的水分会降低润滑效率，造成轴承损坏。
definition.insulationFailureResultingShortCircuitDa: 绝缘失效会造成短路。若未及时发现，他会造成巨大的破坏。
definition.failureCirculatingOil泵电动机: 循环油泵或发动机故障会造成核心区无法排出热量。
definition.deteriorationTransformerBushingInsulatin: 变压器绝缘套管的退化会给总线和变压器带来灾难性的破坏。退化可能源于润滑油中的湿气，纤维素绝热材料的老化（20-25年）。不相关的问题都会成为潜在的危险区域。
definition.rissbildungUndVerschleiss: 筒轮缘驱动开裂或磨损（调节）
definition.defektDesVomHydraulikzylinder: 引导装置受限于液压缸缺陷
definition.kurzschlussDurch: 由于盾体连接块的故障导致短路
definition.rückgangDerIsolierfähigkeit2: 磁极线圈绝缘性能的下降
definition.rückgangDerIsolierfähigkeit3: 绝缘性能的下降 the single head of (off)
definition.defekteMechanische: Defective mechanical mounting of pole (pole strips)
definition.defektEinesRadial: Radial or guide 轴承缺陷ive (slide 轴承looseness)
definition.verschmutzung: Contamination of electrical components in the generator
definition.esKommtKein: No cooling water coming to the transformer
definition.derKuhler: Cooler capacity reduced due to contamination
definition.dasTransformatorol: Transformer oil loses its isolation power due to natural ageing.
definition.dieIsolation: Transformer winding isolation is 缺陷ive. That can be linked either to an excessive mechanical strain, or to a partial short circuit.
definition.dasIsolationsMaterial: Insulation material loses its isolation power due to natural ageing.
definition.dasTransformatorenolIst: Transformer oil has its chemical properties changed due to a (partial) short circuit.
definition.propagating电动机ShaftCracks: Propagating motor shaft cracks due to fatigue
definition.brokenRotorBar: Broken rotor bar, crack enterings, rotor bow
definition.faultsInducedThroughWear: Faults induced through wear or load
definition.fatigueFracture: Fatigue fracture, forced fracture or abrasion wear of gear teeth, load, misalignment
definition.wearOrAbrasionOfCouplingElemtens: Wear or abrasion of coupling elemtens, misalignment, incorrect clearings
definition.faultsInducedThroughWear1: Faults induced through wear or load, misalignment
definition.wearOfLining: Wear of lining induced through rolling elements, which leads to inbalance
definition.contaminationWithSolidParticles: 固体颗粒污染、进水和沙尘；错误的润滑剂
definition.lubricantDegradation: 因老化或周遭环境引发的润滑剂变质
definition.phasingProblems: Phasing problems, inbalance voltages, loose wedge, eccentricity, insulation failure
definition.waterWallTubesAreSubjectToHigh温度: 水冷壁管处于高温、高压、高污染以及高浓度硅液的恶劣环境。巨大的温差导致泄漏(Δt增大►气泡►)。低pH值和氧气都会引起腐蚀。因此泄漏。High temperature differentials cause leakages (increase of Δt ► blister ► fishmouth). Low pH and oxygen causes corrosion. Thereby leakages.
definition.high温度HighPressure: High temperature (1000°F) and high pressure (2500 psi) cause superheater tube leakages, especially when starting up the boiler.
definition.high温度LowerPressure: High temperature (1000°F) and lower pressure (500-600 psi) cause reheater tube leakages. During start-up, since there is no flow, reheater is susceptible to overheating.
definition.highPressureWaterErosion: High pressure and water cause erosion-related leakage. Feed water is coming through the high pressure heater (3000 psi, but 475°F) into the header
definition.water泵edViaBoiler: Water in the forced-circulation-boiler is pumped via boiler (re-) circulating pumps, moving the heat out of the boiler - 2 out of 4 pumps need to run
definition.waterSideScalingDueToDepositBuildup: Water side scaling due to deposit buildup
definition.crackingOfHeaderConnectionsMudDrums: Cracking of header connections to the mud drums, water/steam leakage at manways
definition.steamLeaksManwayGasketsPipe: Steam leaks at manway gaskets, pipe penetrations, Safety valves.
definition.OutsideTubesHaveTighterClearance: The outside of the tubes (with fins) have tighter clearance - deposits from incomplete combustions could block flue gas path.
definition.foulingRegenerativeAirHeater: Fouling of regenerative air heater due to ash deposits or incomplete combustion deposits.
definition.flueGasDuctHeater: The flue gas duct, going from the air heater to the ID fan, may leak. Lowering capacity. No unit trip, but reduced efficiency.
definition.contaminationOfLubeOil: Contamination of lube oil due to seal leakage allowing external contaminants to enter the oil.
definition.stressesInducedDuringStart: Stresses induced during start-up can result in insulation failure and short circuit damage to windings. Improvement by slow start mechanism, reduces start-up stresses.
definition.axialBearingDefectNormalBearingWear: Axial (thrust) 轴承缺陷 due to normal 轴承wear. Axial movement of fan due to imbalanced operation of inlet dampers, i.e. linkage or broken or out of adjustment between the 2 sides.
definition.babbittedBearingDefectsWhichCanCaused: Babbitted 轴承缺陷s, which can be caused by rotor imbalance or oil  resulting in wear and increased clearances.
definition.缺陷ControlDamperControllingFlueGas: Defect of the control damper, controlling how much flue gas is sucked into the fan.
definition.typicallyStressInducedFlawWill: Typically stress-induced flaw that will grow over time due to fan start/stop cycles and any unbalance.
definition.unbalanceFanRotorDueLossBalanceWeight: Unbalance of fan rotor due to loss of balance weight, dirt build-up on fan blades, periodic maintenance.
definition.looseMisalignedCouplingBetween电动机Fan: Loose or misaligned coupling between motor and fan.
definition.stressInducedCrackingFanVanes: Stress-induced cracking of fan vanes (blades), can potentially cause fan imbalance.
definition.waterInLubeOil: Water in the lube oil will reduce the lubricating ability of the oil, resulting in damage to the bearings. Contamination sources such as: condensation, cooling water leaks, seal leakage, etc.
definition.particulateContaminationOfOil: Particulate contamination of the oil will increase 轴承wear and lead to a 轴承failure. Contamination sources such as: dust/dirt influx through seals, 轴承wear particles, etc.
definition.stressInducedCrackingVanes: Stress-induced cracking of fan vanes (blades), can potentially cause fan imbalance.
definition.缺陷ControlDamperControllingAirSupplied: Defect of the control damper, controlling how much air is supplied to the boiler for combustion.
definition.boilerFeed泵sAreEquippedWithBalanceDrum: 锅炉 feed pumps are equipped with a balance drum to compensate for internal thrust. The Labyrinth seal on the discharge end of the pump allows a measured leakage reduces pressure to atmospheric.
definition.pumpSideWhenStartingBFPWithLow: 泵 side: When starting the BFP with low loads, recirc lines are open to increase flow. These wear. Suction comes from the deaerator, i.e. a big storage to provide positive head to the boiler feed pump. This feature is very maintenance intensive due to high pressure drop (3000 lbs to several hundred lbs).
definition.缺陷BboilerFeedControls: Defect of the boiler feed controls, on the pump and turbine side. Woodward control system is used.
definition.缺陷AxialBbearingEitherSide: Defect of the axial (thrust) 轴承on either side, either on the pump or on the turbine side.
definition.缺陷OneRadialBearings: Defect of one of the radial babbit bearings - they are on the pump and one on the tubine side.
definition.noFlowPickupSwitchingFromOne泵: No flow pickup (pump side) when switching from one pump to the other, when on 50% load
definition.steamSealBFPTurbineGoesCasingDrain: Steam seal on the BFP turbine goes into casing drain header, they flood high, blades are in water, hence trip
definition.looseMisalignedCouplingBetween: Loose or misaligned coupling between pump and turbine.
definition.inabilityLoadUnitTripCanBeRelated: Inability to meet/maintain load, or unit trip. It can be related to mechanical or EH problem, e.g. switch misalignment. Typically more of an instantaneous failure.
definition.bladeLiberatesWheelResultingDamage: Blade liberates from wheel, resulting in damage to downstream areas of the turbine. Depending on the extent of damage unit may operate with elevated vibration or trip.
definition.waterInductionTurbinePipeRemovingSteam: Water induction in the turbine, pipe removing steam from turbine, heating feed-water - water in the turbine is extremely damaging.
definition.reheatValvesMeetSafetyPurposesReheatVavl: Reheat valves meet safety purposes. Reheat valves stop the steam flow and prevent over-speeding after a generator trip.  The valves may stick partially or fully open due to oxide build-up or bent stem rubbing against bushing.
definition.deviation温度BearingsOverheat: Deviation of oil 温度。 When lube oil is too hot, bearings overheat. When lube oil is too cold, vibration increases due to viscosity
definition.unbalanceIssuesRelatedDegradationTurbine: Unbalance issues and related degradation on turbine shaft, generator, coupling. This may be due to dislocated weights (e.g. on the turbine wheels, initially mounted to correct the unbalance), blade deposition or blade liberation
definition.leakageOilLubeSystem: Leakage of oil from the lube oil system. This could lead to 轴承overheating, fire, etc.
definition.bearingDefectsCausedRotorImbalance: Bearing 缺陷s can be caused by rotor imbalance or油污染 resulting in wear and increased clearances.
definition.overTimeCopperDustParticlesAccumulate: Over time, copper dust and particles accumulate in windings and cause short circuits (to ground). This may get worse and damage the generator. Potential for faulty relays
definition.SealOilSystemProvidesPressurized: The seal oil system provides pressurized oil to the hydrogen seals on the generator shaft. Failure to maintain the proper H2/seal oil differential pressure will result in either H2 leakage out of, or oil leakage into the generator.
definition.theVoltageRegulatorAutomaticallyControls: The voltage regulator automatically controls the current flow to the generator field through the excitation system to maintain constant terminal voltage as generator load changes. This also maintains system bus voltage. A 缺陷 in the voltage regulator can in turn impact system bus voltage.
definition.mainLeadsIsoPhaseBusDuct: Main leads are in iso-phase bus duct, and cooled. The cover of the iso-phase bus is bolted together. Bolts must be tight to avoid induction heating of the bus duct and eventual short circuit of the main leads.
definition.statorLiquidCoolingSystem: Stator liquid cooling system 缺陷. De-ionized water (to cool rectifier and generator stator) leaking at connections into generator and the cabinets.
definition.generatorCooledCirculatingHydrogenGasThr: 发电机is cooled by circulating hydrogen gas through the unit. Hydrogen can leak from system piping, valving, and shaft hydrogen seals.
definition.ccppDef1: 电动机不平衡、错位或者配件间隙(油污染所致磨损)都会引起轴承缺陷。
definition.ccppDef2: Improper combustion in one or more cumbustors will result in non-uniform gas temperatures in the turbine section, reducing unit输出and increasing emissions.
definition.ccppDef3: Ambient air contamination adheres to the compressor stationay and rotating blades reducing compressor air flow, discharge pressure and efficiency
definition.ccppDef4: Unbalance issues and related degradation on turbine shaft, generator, coupling. This may be due to dislocated weights (e.g. on the turbine wheels, initially mounted to correct the unbalance), blade deposition or blade liberation.
definition.ccppDef5: Accumulation of contmainate from fuel or air on the turbine blades which can cuase reduced输出of the turbine.
definition.ccppDef6: Deviation of lube oil 温度。 When lube oil is too hot, bearings overheat. When lube oil is too cold, vibration increases due to viscosity.
definition.ccppDef8: Particulate contamination of the oil will increase 轴承wear and lead to a 轴承failure. Contamination sources such as; dust/dirt influx through seals, 轴承wear particles, etc.
definition.ccppDef9: Oil degradation is most commonly caused by oxidation, thermal breakdown, additive depletion and contamination. The degradation will result in increased wear throughout the system.
definition.ccppDef10: Varnish build-up is a thin film deposit often found on bearings, servo-mechanisms and other metal surfaces. Varnish buildup results from lube oil degradation, mainly due to extreme temperatures and the presence of oxygen in the lube oil. Varnish build-up casuses excessive wear on parts and can lead to 轴承failures
definition.ccppDef11: Restriction of cooling air flow and/or increased clearances of rotating-to-stationary seals can result in the ingestion of high temperature gases into wheel/disc cavities. The excessive temperatures can result in wheel/disc failures.
definition.ccppDef12: Cycling of HRSG's can result in the build-up of corrosion deposits on finned tubes, degrading the heat transfer efficiency and also increasing the pressure drop across the HRSG. This will result in loss of MW output.
definition.ccppDef13: SCR degradation can result from contaminants in the fuel which can 'poison' the catalyst and reduce the catalyst's ability to control Nox emissions.
definition.ccppDef14: Thermal fatigue of HRSG components such as SH/RH tubes, steam drums can result from temperature variations when the unit swings load or cycles off line. The fatigue will result in tube failures and crack of steam drums.
definition.ccppDef15: Flow-accelerated corrosion occurs when the protective layer of magnetite dissolves and is carried away by the flow of water. Occurs in lower temperature sections such as: LP econimizers and LP steam drums. Severity is the result of water chemistry and temperatures.
definition.ccppDef16: Duct burner 缺陷s can result in the damage to tube by flame impingement and the increase in unit emissions from improper combustion.
definition.ccppDef17: Attemperator 缺陷s can impact the control of steam temperaures from the HRSG. It can also cause thermal fatigue damage to downstream piping and HRSG tubing from improper evaporation of spray water.
definition.ccppDef19: Water induction in the turbine, pipe removing steam from turbine, heating feedwater - water in the turbine is extremely damaging.
definition.ccppDef26: Arcing is a fault caused by a high energy discharge such as: winding turn-to-tun short circuit; winding open circuit; operation of a built-in LTC, excessive moisture in oil; loose connections; etc.
definition.ccppDef27: Corona / partial discharge is a fault of low energy which is the result of localized dielectric breakdown of a small portion of solid or fluid insulation system under high voltage stress. Some causes are: winding/lead distortion or displacement; loose connections; exceesive moisture in oil; etc.
definition.ccppDef28: Overheating of Oil will result in the breakdown insulating characteristics of the oil. Some causes are: damaged insulation; overloading of transformer; core damage; cooling system malfunctions; etc
definition.ccppDef29: Breakdown of inter-strand insulation results in circulating currents causing overheating of insulation (cellulose) and hot spots at point of fault.Some causes are: winding turn-to turn short circuit; winding open circuit; overloding of transformer; moisture in oil; etc.
definition.ccppDef30: Cooling fans are used to force air across the transformer heat exchangers. Loss of fans can result in increased temperture, which in turn may require reduction in load. Defect maybe failure of fan motor, temperature switch, damaged fan baldes.
definition.ccppDef31: Presence of water in oil accelerates the deterioration of both insulating oil and paper insulation, liberating more water. This will in turn reduce the di-elctric properties of the oil and the paper insulation.
definition.ccppDef32: Particulate contamination of the oil will reduce the insulating properties of the oil. It can also reduce heat dissipation of the windings.Some causes are: improper procedures during oil transfer; rust from the tank; insulation breakdown; etc.
definition.ccppDef33: Oil degrades over time while in operation resulting reduced insulating properties. Oxidation is acid formed by oil in contact with oxygen. This acid will form a sludge which settles on windings and  reduces heat dissipation of the windings.
definition.generalMechanicalDefectDieselEngine: General mechanical 缺陷 of the diesel engine. In particular, 轴承缺陷 or mechanical unbalance, possibly leading to overheating.
definition.generalElectricalDefectDieselEngine: General elecrical 缺陷 of the diesel engine. In particular EMS, MVS, CCU, LHPU and sensor 缺陷s.
definition.generalMechanicalDefect变速箱: General mechanical 缺陷 of the gearbox. In particular, gear, clutch and LHPU 缺陷s and related speed limitations.
definition.generalMechanicalDefectHydraulic: General mechanical 缺陷 of the hydraulic system.
definition.CCUHydraulicFan: CCU hydraulic fan, power supply, detection and sensor 缺陷s.
definition.缺陷Sealing: Defective sealing of engine, gearbox and/or hydraulic system, thereby ingress of water.
definition.缺陷AirFilter: Defective air filter(s) of engine, gearbox and/or hydraulic system, thereby ingress of solid contaminants such as sand and dirt.
definition.increased振动OfThe泵: Increased vibration of the pump shaft, specifically 0,5x displacement, most likely caused by oil rub in the bearings. This malfunction occurs predominantly on the lower bearing, but can also relate to the upper 轴承and can increase or decrease when the load of the pump changes.
definition.severe泵Damage: Severe pump damage due to broken shaft. This malfunction is progressing very fast. In most cases, it is caused by a non-detected welding problem during the shaft construction.
definition.increased振动Levels: Unstable behavior of the shaft, possibly caused by misalignment, bad balancing of the pump after overhaul, severe pressure changes in the reactor vessel or in the pump flow.
definition.contactInThe泵: Contact in the pump motor between rotor and stator.
definition.impellerLooseness: Looseness of the impeller, fixed on the rotor, and loss of clearance.
definition.possibleLacIn: Defect in the flywheel assembly, leading to a wheel slip.
definition.alignmentFailure: Alignment failure of the pump shaft.
definition.radialOrAxial: Radial or axial (thrust) 轴承degradation (Combined malfunction!).
definition.bearingDamage: Bearing damage due to current leaks trough rotor and stator. Possibly presence of arcs through the oil film in the bearing.
definition.motorStatorWinding: 电动机 stator winding insulation failure, leading to increasing stator current and increasing stator winding temperature due to possible short circuit or insulation failure.
definition.lossOfOil: Loss of oil in the bearing, possibly due to 轴承wear.
definition.oilQualityChange: Oil quality change due to contamination with metal particles and/or water ingress.
definition.abnormalLeakFlow: 密封1和2之间异常的泄漏流量。
definition.degradationOfOring: Degradation of O-Ring and insert of seals 1 or 2 (combined malfunction!) due to aging or inferior seal material.
definition.foulingOfThePlate: Fouling of the plate of seal 1 due to possible deposit of iron oxyde.

detection.WT4: 磨损可以通过振动和润滑油的分析以及温度的升高检测到。
detection.WT5: 润滑油分析、视觉观察润滑油乳浊状态
detection.WT6: 磨损可以通过振动和润滑油的分析以及温度的升高检测到。
detection.WT10: 增加的定子绕组温度、振动以及电气数据。
detection.WT11: 冷却剂、反相器以及电气参数
detection.oilTempreratureCoolerInlet: Oil temperature at cooler inlet/outlet, 轴承temperatures, cooling water temperatures at inlet/outlet, and 振动。
detection.bearing温度sOilAnalysisVisualObservation: 轴承温度， oil analysis, visual observation of milky appearance of the oil.
detection.temperaturesArraysThermocouplesGenerator: 温度s, arrays of thermocouples in the generator winding. Also generator ground detection providing digital alarm, i.e. one of the phases is leading into the ground, relay detection.
detection.temperatureParametersDGAandFCADischarge: 温度 parameters, oil DGA and FCA, partial discharge.
detection.temperatureTransformerOilAbsoluteValues: 温度 data for transformer and oil - absolute values vs. Load and ambient temperature, as well as visual inspection of fan operation.
detection.DGAandFCAdischarge: Oil DGA and FCA, partial discharge.
detection.DGAfuranAnalysisDobleTesting: DGA, furan analysis, Doble testing, thermal scanning, partial discharge.
detection.schwingungsdaten: (2 x) vibration and 轴承temperature data (just before the break, if any)
detection.schwingungsdatenAmLaufradmantel: 振动 data to the barrel wheel jacket
detection.schwingungsdatenAmLaufradmantel2: 振动 data to the barrel wheel jacket, active data leaks
detection.schwingungsdatenAmLaufradmantel4: Crack formation on the surface of turbine rotors
detection.erhöhteAlarmmeldefrequenz3: Enhanced alarm reporting frequency, pump switch-on intervals and oil feed head temperature (but not in Bannwil)
detection.erhöhteLagertemperatur: Increased 轴承temperature, mechanical lubricant (lead-tin alloy) and chemical parameters of the lubricant (CU/PB share)
detection.dielektrischeMessung: Dielectric measurement (tangent delta, partial discharge resistance measurement)
detection.niedrigUndHoch: Low and high induction measurement and reduction of the nominal power
detection.trafoGasMessung: Transformer gas measurement (annually), dielectric measurement (all 8 years)
detection.erhöhteWarm: Enhanced warm and cold air temperature, as well as enhanced winding 温度
detection.änderungen: Changes in tangent delta and polarization index
detection.vibrationFrequencySpectrum: 振动 frequency spectrum of rotatory frequency
detection.rotatoryFrequencySpectrum: Rotatory frequency spectrum, motor signature analysis
detection.elementDefectFrequencies: Element 缺陷 frequencies and cage rotational frequency in PeakVue
detection.gearMeshFrequencies: Gear mesh frequencies of gear stages in rotatory frequency spectrum
detection.vibration电动机: 振动, motor current signature analysis
detection.elementDefectFrequencies1: Element 缺陷 frequencies and cage rotational frequency in envelope spectrum
detection.vibrationFlowPressure: 振动, flow data, pressure data
detection.flowPressureVisual: Flow rate, pressure (process data), visual inspection
detection.waterChemistry炉Tube温度sAcoustic: Water chemistry (hydrozene residual, pH and phosphate content), furnace temperature spikes, tube temperatures, acoustic data.
detection.furnace温度RampRatesAcousticMetal: 炉 temperature and/or pressure spikes, ramp rates (change in temperature over time), acoustic data. Tube metal 温度。Margan sensor picking up microcracks on reheater and superheater.
detection.waterChemistryAcousticSensorsEddyCurrent: Water chemistry, acoustic sensors, eddy current (not measured).
detection.pressureDifferentialBetween泵s: Pressure differential between the boiler recirc pumps (inlet and outlet going into mud drums). Specific condition data from pump. Only 2 out of the 4 boiler recirc pumps need to run…
detection.waterChemistryBoilerRecirculation泵Differ: Water chemistry data, boiler recirculation pump differential pressure, boiler tube metal temperatures.
detection.temperatureDifferentialsOrAcousticData: 温度 differentials or acoustic data (check with T5), recirculation valve leakage - drum level dropping.
detection.visualInspectionAndAudibleIndications: Visual inspection and audible indications, drum level indication
detection.highFlueGasPressureMeasuredManometer: High flue gas pressure, measured by manometer - ID fans are sucking, so small inches of water can be backpath-profiled by results team. Differential pressure across tube bundles.
detection.pressureDifferentialAirTempsFecreasing: Pressure differential, air outlet temps decreasing vs. load, gas outlet temperatures increasing vs. load.
detection.acousticGas温度DuctPressure: Acoustic data (casing leakage), gas temperature, duct pressure vs fan operation (amps, damper position, boiler load).
detection.elevated温度Amps: Elevated temperature and amps readings (but not on plant computer) (motor current signature testing only to prioritize scheduled maintenance)
detection.excessive振动Elevated温度sLubricantData: 剧烈振动、升高的温度、润滑油数据.
detection.runningAirAffectingLoad: Running out of air, affecting load, not sucking flue gas out – saw-tooth pattern of pressure parameter for fan inlet. Also, vibration data of fan bearings. Numerical indication of control value (position indication of damper position vs load/airflow). Also, furnace gas swinging at higher loads.
detection.excessive振动ElevatedBearing温度s: 剧烈振动，升高的轴承温度。Crack verification by ultrasonic inspection.
detection.excessive振动IncreasingFanBearing温度: 剧烈振动，升高的风机轴承温度。
detection.vibrationFanBearing温度s: 振动, 风机轴承温度.
detection.oilAnalysisBearingTemp: 润滑油分析， 轴承温度
detection.elevatedStator温度电动机Bearings: Elevated stator temperature, and possibly motor bearings, Increased 轴承振动。 电动机 current signature testing to confirm and prioritize scheduled maintenance.
detection.numericalIndicationControlValueDamperPos: Numerical indication of control value (position indication of damper position), damper position vs. load and air flow.
detection.bearingTempOilAnalysis: 轴承温度， oil analysis, visual observation of milky appearance of the oil.
detection.temperatureOfSeal140: 温度 of seal (condensate at 140° F and feed pump discharge at 300°C, thermocouple, Delta pressure across the seal flow, indicating seal leak-off.
detection.capacityLossTriedAcoustic: Capacity loss (MW). Tried acoustic, but lots of ambient noise - device screwed on recirc valve. Does not knock off line. Possible slow loss of drum level at higher loads.
detection.inability泵ProperlyRespond: Inability of pump to properly respond to demand signals during operation. Potential inability to start/stop pump.
detection.bearing温度振动Lubricant: Bearing 温度, 振动 and lubricant data.
detection.vibrationSignalsFrom4Spots: 振动 signals from 4 spots, lubricant data from 4 spots (in particular fine particles from the babbit material).
detection.vibrationIndicationSteamSeal温度s: 振动 indication, steam seal temperatures and/or pressure… Four-stage condensing turbine, outflow goes straight into the condenser, with quick pressure drop.
detection.excessiveBearing振动Elevated: Excessive 轴承vibration and elevated 轴承temperature
detection.controlValvePositionLoad: Control valve position vs. load or first stage pressure, limit switch indications.
detection.temperatureLubricant振动Altogether: 温度，润滑剂， vibration on altogether 10 bearings.
detection.stepChangesBearing振动: Step-changes to 轴承vibration/temperatures, turbine pressures
detection.thermocouplesTurbineSteamExtraction: Thermocouples in turbine steam extraction lines and turbine shells indicating such water induction (temperature reading falls outside of range), also vibration,  RH attemperator spray valve position (open when off line), flood levels in feedwater heaters.
detection.indicatedHigh旋转SpeedVisualInspection: Indicated by high rotation speed. Visual inspection of valve stems for rubbing, observation during valve testing of smooth operation. If limit switch data is available, this can be tracked with unit cycles and valve testing to ensure proper operation. Track time to close during testing for stem rubbing.
detection.temperatureVisualLubeOilTankLevel: 温度 (oil and bearing), visual, lube oil tank level indication.
detection.OEMsupervisorySystemMonitorsGenerator: OEM supervisory system, which monitors data such as generator amps and vars (reactive power), protecting generator from excessive damage, field ground detection system
detection.generatorHydrogenPressurePurityH2: 发电机hydrogen pressure and purity,H2/seal oil differential pressure, Elevated generator temperatures as hydrogen purity decreases. Generator liquid level detection alarm (manually drain periodically to check for liquid)
detection.excitationSytemCheckedWhatGoesPI: Excitation system, to be checked what goes into PI (???) Monitoring of relationships between generator voltage/load/vars/current.
detection.conductivityParameterManualInspections: Conductivity parameter (in micromhos, opposite of OHMs), manual inspections, water level decreasing, pump pressures. Off-line OEM testing (SLIMS) to detect internal generator cooling water leaks.
detection.hydrogenPressureSinkingHydrogenPurity: Hydrogen pressure sinking, hydrogen purity decreasing, increased stator temperatures, seal oil pressure differential decreasing (seal oil system problem), manual leak detection device (sniffer)
detection.ccppDet3: Compressor discharge pressure and temperature, air flow (if measured).
detection.ccppDet5: Efficiency degradation, inability to reach full load. Increasing pressure differentials through turbine.
detection.ccppDet11: Fouling of the elements can be detected by monitoring the pressure drop across the HRSG or increase in the outlet pressure of the GT.
detection.ccppDet12: Monitoring the NOx reduction across the catalyst layer relative to the ammonia injection rates, Ammonia slip rate.
detection.ccppDet13: Monitoring temperatures and rates of change duration operation and start-ups/shutdowns.
detection.ccppDet14: Water chemistry monitoring and control during operation and startups, in particular the concentration levels of dissolved oxygen and iron.
detection.ccppDet15: Monitoring of flows (GT exhaust, duct burner fuel,SCR ammonia), flue gas constituents, flue gas temperatures.
detection.ccppDet16: Montior steam temperatures, attemperator valve position, steam and attemperator flows.
detection.ccppDet17: 温度，润滑剂， 轴承振动。
detection.ccppDet18: Thermocouples in turbine steam extraction lines and turbine shells indicating such water induction (temperature reading falls outside of range), also vibration,  RH attemperator spray valve position (open when off line), 'flood' levels in feedwater heaters.
detection.ccppDet20: Cooling oil DGA, , furan analysis of oil, Doble testing, short circuit reactance testing, frequency response analysis (FRA).
detection.ccppDet22: 温度 parameters, oil DGA and FCA, thermal scanning, absolute temperature vs. load and ambient 温度。
detection.ccppDet23: Transformer core absloute temperature and vs. load and ambient temperature, as well as current, voltage (in/out) and VARs.
detection.engineRPM: Engine RPM (speed), oil pressure, cooling water level and temperature, charged air and fuel temperatures, lubricant viscosity, PQ index and particle counts.
detection.engineRPMChargedAir: Engine RPM (speed), charged air and fuel 温度。Electrical condition data.
detection.gearboxRPM: 变速箱 RPM (speed), oil pressure and temperature,lubricant viscosity, PQ index and particle counts.
detection.engineRPMOilPressure: Engine RPM (speed), oil pressure and temperature data.
detection.coolingWaterChargedAirTemp: Cooling water and charged air temperature, CCU hydraulic oil level and temperature, hydraulic oil viscosity, PQ index and wear particles.
detection.siliconParticleCount: 硅 particle count in the lubricant.
detection.subharmonic: Detection via total vibration on V1 and V2, in particular via subharmonic, 0,5x displacement on both V2. No detection via temperature or flow. Some sensitivy to injection flow.
detection.increased振动MoreSpecific: Increased vibration levels on V1 and V2, more specifically 2x harmonic amplitude and phase on V2. Sometimes increased 轴承temperatures due to pump instabillity, possibly leading to higher oil 温度。Certainty via x-ray during major overhaul.
detection.increased振动1X: Increased 1x vibration and displacement levels. Possibly changing oil and 轴承temperatures, in case of heavy unbalance.
detection.increased电动机Upper: Increased absolute and 1x vibration and phase levels on the pump motor.
detection.detectionByChanging: Detection by changing vibration measurements V1 and V2 on the motor of the pump. Changing impeller position leads to changes in the motor current and thermal power measurement E5 and pump flow via P1.
detection.Increased1X: Increased absolute and relative vibration measurements, 1X ampliture and phase.
detection.slightDecreaseLeak: Slight decrease of the leak flow of seal 1 at F3, and abnormal temperature of the lower and upper 轴承of the motor at T5 and T7. Furthermore, increased absolute vibration levels at V1, and increased 2X vibration levels V2.
detection.lowOilLevel: 温度 increase for the obeserved 轴承at T5 and T7, temperature increase of the thrust 轴承at T6 and T8, and increase of the absolute vibration levels.
detection.leakageCurrentsTrough: Low insulation resistance of lower 轴承at E1, low insulation resistance of cables and stator at E2, low shaft voltage at E4, increasing stator current at E5.
detection.increasingStatorCurrent: Increasing stator current measurement at E5, increasing stator winding temperature at T4.
detection.lowOilLevelInTheLubrificationCircuit: For the upper and lower bearings, increase of the temperature measuremnts at T5 and T7, low oil level measurements in the lubrication circuit of the concerned 轴承at L1 and L2, and increasing temperature measurements at the thrust 轴承at T6 and T8.
detection.changingOfTheOilLevels: Lubricant analysis results at L1 and L2, changes of the oil levels in the lubrication circuit, and possibly increase of one of the 轴承temperatures at T5 to T8.
detection.increasedFlowOfSeal: Increasing flow of seal 1 at F3, combined with normal leak flow for seal 2 <which sampling point?>
detection.changingInLeakFlowSeal1: Abnormal increase in leak flow on seal 1 at F1, F2, F3 due to temperature increase in seal injection water supply line at T1, combined with normal leak flow for seal 2. Irregular leak flow in seal 1 during pressure increase in the reactor vessel. Pressure increase in primary suction line P <?>.
detection.changesInTheLeakFlow: Changes (increase or decrease) in the leak flow of seal 1 at F1 and F3, with constant increase of the leak flow (>20%), combined with changes in the leak water temperature at T2 and in the water temperature at T3.

relatedDataSources.V1andV2: V1 and V2 . Depending of the installed vibration measurements with proximity probes (displacement measurements) or absolute vibration measurements on the casing of the pump.
relatedDataSources.increasing振动Levels1X: Increasing vibration levels 1X (measurements V1 and V2) more specific the 2X component V2 amplitude and phase. Temp. Measurements T5-T6-T7-T8.
relatedDataSources.vibrationMeasurementV1andV2: 振动 measurement V1 and V2 and in some cases by heavy unbalance changed oil and 轴承temperatures T5-T6-T7-T8.
relatedDataSources.absolute振动Measurments: Absolute vibration measurements on the motor V1 (1X and phase), upper and lower 轴承temperature measurements of the pump motor T5 and T7
relatedDataSources.all振动Measurments: All vibration measurements on the motor V1-V2, current and thermal power measurements E5 of the pump motor, changes in the pump flow eventually influenced by P1
relatedDataSources.increasedRelative振动Measurments: Increased relative vibration measurements 1X amplitude and phase,measurements V1 and V2
relatedDataSources.vibrationMesurementsV1V2: 振动 mesurements V1-V2, temp mesurements T5-T7, flow measurement  F3
relatedDataSources.oilLevelMeasurementsL1L2: Oil level measurements L1&2, temperature measurements T5 - T7, temperature measurements thrust 轴承T6 - T8, vibration measurements V1 - V2
relatedDataSources.lowerBearingInsulationResistance: Lower 轴承insulation resistance low E1, insulation resistance E2 cables and stator low, shaft voltage  E4  low, increasing stator current E5,
relatedDataSources.statorCurrentMeasurementE5: Stator current measurement E5, stator temp measurement T4
relatedDataSources.forTheUpperAndLower: For the upper and lower 轴承increase of the temperature measuremnts T5 -T7, low level oil measurements L1-L2  increasing temp measurements thrust 轴承T6 -T8
relatedDataSources.oilLevelMeasuremntsL1L21: Oil level measurements L1-L2, 轴承temp measurements T5 - T7, T6 - T8 of the concerned bearing
relatedDataSources.LeakFlowMeasurement: Leak flow measurement F3 at seal 1
relatedDataSources.leakFlowMeasurementSeal: Leak flow measurement seal 1, F1- F2 - F3, temp increase in seal leak supply line T1, pressure increase in primary suction line P combined with variation in F3
relatedDataSources.leakFlowMeasurementF1andF3: Leak flow measurement F1 and F3 evolution combined with changes in T2 (leak water temp.) -T3 (water temp at seal 1)

mitigation.WT1: Remove shaft from service, inspect and re-balance shaft. Inspect and replace bearings as required.
mitigation.WT5: Filter/centrifuge oil to remove water. Remove pump from service if water cannot be removed. Investigate source of water and correct; Filter or replace oil
mitigation.WT8: Remove shaft from service, inspect and re-balance shaft. Inspect and replace bearings as required.
mitigation.WT10: Verification of the stator windings insulation. Replacement of the generator and/or refurbishing of the stator insulation, to avoid risk of generator destruction.
mitigation.removeTurbineAndReplaceDefectiveBearing: Remove turbine from service and replace 缺陷ive bearing. Balance turbine as required.
mitigation.perform振动AnalysisDetermineArearConcern: Perform vibration analysis to determine arear of concern. Remove turbine from service and balance effected equipment through balance shot.
mitigation.removeUnitServiceInvestigateEliminate: Remove unit from service, investigate and eliminate source of water.
mitigation.verifyCoolingWaterControlValveOperation: Verify cooling water control valve operation, remove cooler from service, inspect and clean as required.
mitigation.removeTurbineServiceEitherMechanically: Remove turbine from service to either mechanically or chemically clean turbine.
mitigation.removeTurbineServiceEliminateCause: Remove turbine from service eliminate cause of damage and replace bearing.
mitigation.removeTurbineServiceRepairDamage: Remove turbine from service and repair damage.
mitigation.removeTransformerCorrectLooseness: Remove unit/transformer from service and correct looseness.
mitigation.monitorUntilSeverityRequiresTransformer: Monitor until severity requires transformer be removed from service and repaired.
mitigation.reduceLoadMonitorRemoveTransformer: Reduce load and monitor. Remove transformer from service and repair.
mitigation.removeTransformerServiceRepair: Removal of unit/transformer from service and repair.
mitigation.isolateRepairReplace泵: Isolate and repair/replace pump or motor.
mitigation.removeUnitServiceProcessRemoveWater: Remove unit from service and process oil to remove water. Check and correct source of water: breather, gasketing, manhole cover, explosion diaphragm, and observe oil/paper insulation degradation.
mitigation.oilReplacementOrFiltration: 更换或过滤油，更换过滤器
mitigation.shutDownAndFixTheLeak: Shut down and fix the leak.
mitigation.fullLoadOperationCapacity: Full Load operation due to spare pump capacity
mitigation.planAndScheduleBoilerChemicalCleaning: Plan and schedule boiler chemical cleaning.
mitigation.shutDownReplaceGasket: Shut down unit and replace gasket / repair seating surface.
mitigation.noUnitTripSootBlowingOil: No unit trip. Soot blowing when firing oil, proper combustion control (excess oxygen, air/fuel ratio).
mitigation.useSootBblowersFuelSpecifications: Use of soot blowers (oil- or gas-fired boiler- do we blow soot?), fuel specifications, proper combustion control.
mitigation.temporaryPatchOnlinePermanentRepairOffli: Temporary patch online, permanent repair offline.
mitigation.removeServiceRewindReplace电动机: Remove from service and rewind/replace motor.
mitigation.removeFanFromServiceReplaceBearingInspec: Remove fan from service and replace bearing, inspect damper linkages.
mitigation.removeFanFromServiceReplaceBearing: Remove fan from service and replace bearing.
mitigation.removeFanFromServiceInspectFriveUnitDamp: Remove fan from service, inspect drive unit/damper/linkages.
mitigation.removeFanFromServiceReplaceRotor: Remove fan from service and replace rotor. Inspect and replace fan bearings as required.
mitigation.removeFanServiceBalanceFan: Remove fan from service, inspect and re-balance fan. Inspect and replace fan bearings as required.
mitigation.removeFanFromServiceCheck电动机AlignmentRea: Remove fan from service, check motor alignment and realign aw required. Inspect coupling for damage or wear.
mitigation.removeFanFromServiceInspectVanesRebalanc: Remove fan from service. Inspect/weld repair vanes. Rebalance fan. Inspect fan bearings and replace as required.
mitigation.removeFanServiceCheckDamperDriveUnitDamp: Remove fan from service. Check damper drive unit, damper linkage.
mitigation.excessiveLeakoffWouldIndicate泵Wear: Excessive leak-off would indicate pump wear and require an overhaul and de-rating of the unit to 50% load
mitigation.reduceLoadRemovePupmReplaceVavle: Reduce load, remove pump from service and replace valve trim or valve
mitigation.remove泵ServiceInvestigate50: Remove pump from service and investigate. 50% load de-rate.
mitigation.monitorConditionSchedule泵: Monitor condition and schedule pump or turbine maintenance. 50% load de-rate.
mitigation.remove泵InspectBearing50Load: Remove pump from service and inspect/replace bearing. 50% load de-rate
mitigation.checkAdjustSteamSealRegulation: Check/adjust steam seal regulation valve, drain piping
mitigation.remove泵InspectCouplingRealign: Remove pump from service, inspect coupling and realign pump to turbine.
mitigation.filterCentrifugeOilRemoveWaterRemove泵: Filter/centrifuge oil to remove water. Remove pump from service if water cannot be removed. Investigate source of water and correct.
mitigation.removeTurbineFromTroubleshoot: Remove turbine from service and troubleshoot.
mitigation.removeUnitServiceInvestigateRepair: Remove unit from service, investigate and repair.
mitigation.investigateDetermineLocationLeakage: Investigate to determine location of leakage. Depending on severity: if small apply temporary patch if severe trip unit. If no visible leak, switch oil coolers.
mitigation.filterOilToRemoveWater: Filter/centifuge oil to remove water. Remove pump from service if water cannot be removed. Investigate source of water and correct.
mitigation.removeTurbineServiceRepair: Remove turbine from service and repair.
mitigation.dependingNatureProblemUnit: Depending on nature of problem, unit shutdown may be required.
mitigation.dependentNatureProblem: Dependent on nature of problem, on-line or off-line repair
mitigation.mainLeadFailureWillResultUnitTrip: Main lead failure will result in unit trip and catastrophic damage. Remove turbine from service and repair.
mitigation.dependentNatureProblemShutDown: Dependent on nature of problem, could be on-line repair or unit shut-down.
mitigation.dependentNatureLeakPotential: Dependent on nature of leak. Potential on-line repairs or requires unit shut-down.
mitigation.ccppMit1: Perform vibration analysis to determine arear of concern. Remove turbine from service and balance effected equipment through balance shot.
mitigation.ccppMit3: Filter/centifuge oil to remove water. Remove turbine from service if water cannot be removed. Investigate source of water and correct.
mitigation.ccppMit4: May need to filter oil, tranformer out os service
mitigation.reduceClearanceOnTheLower: Reduce clearance on the lower 轴承of the motor.
mitigation.interventionForCorrectAlingment: Correct alignment and balancing for all operating conditions.
mitigation.correctBalancing: Correct balancing, alignment and centering of pump shaft.
mitigation.refixationAndCoorect: Refixation and correct assembly of the pump impeller.
mitigation.interventionToCheckGood: Intervention to check and secure good fixation and balancing of the fly wheel
mitigation.interventionCentering: Intervention targeting centering and aligning of the pump shaft.
mitigation.motorCheckUpDuring: 电动机 check up during overhaul, testing of the insulation conditions of the cabling, rotor and stator windings and pump earthing. Verification of a correct motor and pump shaft earthing.
mitigation.verificationOfTheStator: Verification of the stator windings insulation. Replacement of the motor and/or refurbishing of the stator insulation, to avoid risk of motor destruction.
mitigation.inspectionOfTheConcerned: Inspection of the concerned 轴承and, if  if necessary,更换of the bearing.
mitigation.inspectionOfTheBearings: Inspection of the bearings and the clearances, adjustment of clearances, and in case of 轴承damage更换of the concerned bearing. Change of the oil.
mitigation.inspectionOfTheCondition: Inspection of the condition of the seals and, if necessary,更换of the seal 1.
mitigation.replacementOfTheConcerned: Replacement of the concerned O-ring at the first occasion

comments.WT2: It must be considered that about 10% of all bearings (a priori) will not complete the defined lifetime. Bearing 缺陷s can have many causes.
comments.MayPotentiallyLeadMajorForcedOutage: This may potentially lead to a major forced outage.
comments.coolersPotentiallyCleanedButRisk: Coolers can potentially be cleaned on-line, but there is risk of油污染.
comments.thisNoTrilUnitsOff: This will not trip the unit off-line.
comments.typicallyCausesMajorForcedOutage: This typically causes a major forced outage
comments.uberwachungDer: To discuss the oil supply head temperature in other WKW
comments.dieseFehlerart: This type of malfunction was refined by malfunctions M3.4 to M3.7 and does not make sense anymore.
comments.difficultToSeeIn振动Data: Difficult to see in vibration data
comments.tubesOnRightSideOfTheBoilerDiagram: Tubes on right side of the boiler diagram
comments.shouldDeletedSinceRedundant: Should be deleted, since redundant (sub-)component of boiler
comments.keptSeparateFromM1.1toDetermine: Kept separate from M1.1, to determine the need to chemically clean the boiler to avoid the water wall leak.
comments.proposedEliminationCandidate: Proposed elimination candidate. Desuperheater / attemperator - Leakage impacts efficiency on-line and potential water induction to turbine off-line/start-up.
comments.proposedEliminationCandidateSeeCirclesTw: Proposed elimination candidate. See circles at top of diagram - two blue circles in original diagram.
comments.proposedEliminationCandidateSeeCirclesRe: Proposed elimination candidate. See circles at top of diagram - red and blue circle on top of the original diagram
comments.onlyPossibleWhenBurningOil: Only possible when burning oil! This will not trip the unit…
comments.proposedEliminationCandidateBurningOilRo: Proposed elimination candidate. Only possible when burning oil! The air heater is the brown, rotating metal on the original diagram.
comments.fansHaveLots: Fans have lots of capacity, so leakage must be substantial, more than one joint. Detection thermocouple grid or hotwire anometer (fan sucking at full capacity, but air coming in, sucking air instead of flue gas) or low gas temperature (measuring instreaming air instead of flue gas).
comments.IDFhave13200: The IDF have 13200 V motors, new cycling duty motors, that can handle being turned on and off.
comments.mayLeadMajorForcedOutage: This may lead to a major forced outage.
comments.mayPotentiallyLeadMajorForcedOutage: This may potentially lead to a major forced outage.
comments.lubeOilCoolerLeakWillResultReportableSpi: Lube oil cooler leak will result in a reportable spill to EPA as oil pressure is greater than water pressure. However when unit is out of service and oil system is off, water will contaminate oil.
comments.willNotTripUnitOffLine: This will not trip the unit off-line.
comments.resultExtendedOutage: Can result in an extended outage
comments.drainsUnderTurbineCommonHeader: Drains under turbine go to a common header
comments.asHydrogenPurityDeceases: As Hydrogen purity deceases, there is a potential for explosion.
comments.ccppCom2: Coolers can potentially be cleaned on-line, but there is risk of油污染.
comments.ccppCom3: This will not trip the unit off-line.
comments.thisProblemCanHappen: Purely vibration-related malfunction mode. Further vibration data may help to obtain further insights.
comments.thisTypeOfFailure: Which role does oil analysis play with regard to shaft crack?
comments.interventionForCorrect: Difficult to identify and locate the malfunction causes via vibration analysis.
comments.thereAreProtection: There are protection systems like air gap monitoring for distance control between rotor and stator of the motor
comments.riskOnSevereBearing: Risk on severe 轴承damage and/or pitting due to arcs between fixed and rotating part of the pump
comments.toPreventThisType: Oil analysis is crucial for the detection of this malfunction mode - we assume that samples are taken at L1 and L2.
